items.name: Lemons
items.details: Can stay out at room temperature.

items.name: Oranges
items.details: Can stay out at room temperature.

items.name: Onions
items.details: Can stay out at room temperature.

items.name: Tomatoes
items.details: Can stay out at room temperature, but keep away from direct sunlight.

items.name: Zucchini
items.details: Can be stored at room temperature or in the fridge to last longer.

items.name: Avocados
items.details: Store at room temperature until ripe. Once ripe, refrigerate to prevent spoiling too quickly.

items.name: Cucumbers
items.details: Can be stored at room temperature or in the fridge to last longer.
